---
title: "Go SDK"

import { CardGrid, LinkCard } from '@astrojs/starlight/components';

## Installing the Go SDK

Libra2 provides an official Go SDK in
the [libra2-go-sdk GitHub](https://github.com/libra2org/libra2-go-sdk) repository.
To use the Go SDK, get the main package here:

```shellscript
go get github.com/libra2org/libra2-go-sdk
```
